item.title: Adobe 首席执行官表示，Adobe 的人工智能视频工具将采用不同的定价方式
item.description: Adobe Inc.首席执行官尚塔努-纳拉延（Shantanu Narayen）表示，该公司新的视频生成人工智能产品的定价将有别于其他人工智能工具。【原文：Adobe Inc. Chief Executive Officer Shantanu Narayen said the company’s new video-generating AI product will be priced differently than its other artificial intelligence tools.】

item.title: 员工泄露客户数据后，意大利联合银行面临调查
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Intesa Sanpaolo SpA 正在接受意大利当局的调查，原因是一名员工非法访问了客户的账户信息。【原文：Intesa Sanpaolo SpA is under investigation by Italian authorities after an employee illegally accessed client account information, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Azul 急于筹集现金以完成飞机租赁交易并削减债务
item.description: 作为上周与飞机租赁商达成的协议的一部分，Azul SA 正急于筹集现金，这是该巴西航空公司试图再次重组债务的关键一步。【原文：Azul SA is rushing to raise cash as part of a deal it reached last week with its aircraft lessors, a key step in the Brazilian carrier’s attempt to again rework its debt.】

item.title: 以色列遭受真主党炮火袭击，跨境战斗愈演愈烈
item.description: 以色列称，在真主党无人机袭击造成四名士兵死亡一天后，从黎巴嫩发射了新一轮导弹，双方的越界战斗愈演愈烈。【原文：Israel said a fresh barrage of missiles was fired from Lebanon a day after a Hezbollah drone strike killed four soldiers, as cross-border fighting between the two sides intensified.】

item.title: 前特斯拉高管麦克尼尔创办基金管理公司运营 ETF
item.description: 特斯拉公司和 Lyft 公司前高管乔恩-麦克尼尔（Jon McNeill）正在创办一家公司，经营以人工智能和电气化为重点的交易所交易基金。【原文：Former Tesla Inc. and Lyft Inc. executive Jon McNeill is launching a firm that will run exchange-traded funds that focus on artificial intelligence and electrification.】

item.title: 加密货币公司 Tether 正与大宗商品交易商洽谈借出数十亿美元的事宜
item.description: Tether 控股有限公司（Tether Holdings Ltd）正在探索向大宗商品交易公司提供贷款，因为该公司正在研究如何调配其数十亿美元的利润，此举可能会动摇这个通常依赖传统银行贷款的行业。【原文：Tether Holdings Ltd is exploring lending to commodities trading companies as it looks at ways to deploy its billions of dollars in profits, a move that could shake up an industry typically reliant on traditional banks for credit.】

item.title: 尼日利亚顶级银行在截止日期前成功筹集资本
item.description: 尼日利亚证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）负责人表示，尼日利亚最大的五家银行已成功发行了新资本，以满足严格的新监管要求，轻松超过了 2026 年的最后期限。【原文：Five of Nigeria’s largest banks have successfully issued fresh capital to meet tough new regulatory requirements, the head of the Securities and Exchange Commission said, comfortably beating a 2026 deadline.】

item.title: 乌克兰国内生产总值认股权证持有人选择 PJT 为财务顾问
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，乌克兰 GDP 权证的一批投资者已聘请 PJT Partners Inc.【原文：A group of investors in Ukraine’s GDP warrants has hired PJT Partners Inc. as their financial adviser ahead of a potential restructuring, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯向南非提供信贷协议以促进贸易
item.description: 沙特进出口银行与南非标准银行集团有限公司签署了一项 2500 万美元的信贷协议，以促进沙特王国与非洲大陆最大经济体之间的贸易。【原文：Saudi Export-Import Bank signed a $25 million credit agreement with South Africa’s Standard Bank Group Ltd. to facilitate trade between the kingdom and the continent’s largest economy.】

item.title: 华润怡宝香港上市吸引易捷免税店
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，华润怡宝控股有限公司已吸引全球最大的旅游零售商中国旅游集团免税品公司（China Tourism Group Duty Free Corp.【原文：China Resources Beverage Holdings Co. has attracted China Tourism Group Duty Free Corp., the world’s largest travel retailer, and UBS Asset Management AG as some of the cornerstone investors for its planned Hong Kong initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 以色列针对伊朗导弹的空中防御措施有哪些？
item.description: 以色列以拥有世界上最好的防空系统而自豪，但这些价值数十亿美元的系统正在经受考验。自伊朗支持的巴勒斯坦组织哈马斯于 10 月 7 日挑起与以色列的新战争以来，伊朗支持的其他激进组织也纷纷加入，向以色列发射火箭弹、导弹和无人机。伊朗自己也发动了两次袭击，最近一次是在 10 月 1 日，发射了大约 200 枚导弹。【原文：Israel prides itself on having some of the best air defenses in the world, but these billion-dollar systems are being tested. Since the Iran-backed Palestinian group Hamas provoked a new war with Israel on Oct. 7, other militant organizations supported by Iran have joined in, launching rockets, missiles and drones at Israel. Iran itself has struck twice, most recently on Oct. 1 with a barrage of roughly 200 missiles.】

item.title: 象牙海岸降雨导致收获和交货放缓，可可期货收涨
item.description: 伦敦可可期货延续涨势，原因是头号种植国象牙海岸的暴雨阻碍了新季可可豆的收获和向港口的运输，这是全球供应面临的最新威胁。【原文：Cocoa futures in London extended gains as heavy rains in top grower Ivory Coast hamper the new season harvest and the delivery of beans to ports, the latest threat to global supplies.】

item.title: 纽约环球广场业主寻求就 9.4 亿美元抵押贷款达成协议
item.description: 曼哈顿环球广场的业主，包括 SL Green Realty Corp. 和 RXR，正在就修改该办公楼 9.4 亿美元的优先抵押贷款进行谈判。【原文：The owners of Manhattan’s Worldwide Plaza, including SL Green Realty Corp. and RXR, are in talks to modify a $940 million senior mortgage on the office tower after the debt was transferred to a special servicer, according to a person familiar with the matter who asked not to be identified discussing private talks.】

item.title: 俄罗斯导弹击中本月在乌克兰的第四艘货船
item.description: 随着克里姆林宫加强对基辅贸易基础设施的攻击，俄罗斯导弹本月在乌克兰击中了第四艘货船。【原文：A Russian missile hit a fourth cargo ship in Ukraine this month, as the Kremlin ramps up its attacks on Kyiv’s trade infrastructure.】

item.title: 斯塔默表示英国不会将资本利得税提高到 39% 之高
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）表示，关于英国政府正在考虑将资本利得税提高至 39% 的猜测是 "离谱的"。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer said speculation that the UK government was considering raising capital gains tax as high as 39% was “wide of the mark.”】

item.title: 能源部门业绩不佳，信实集团利润不及预期
item.description: 亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）控制的信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）公布的利润再次低于分析师的预期，原因是其核心炼油业务的利润率疲软，超过了电信资费上涨带来的好处。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd., controlled by billionaire Mukesh Ambani, reported profit that again missed analysts’ estimates, as weak margins from its core oil refining business outweighed the benefits trickling in from higher telecom tariffs.】

item.title: 受到密切关注的合同到期，铝业挤压加剧
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所铝市场的挤压正在接近尾声，在过去两个交易日的一波抛售之后，10月份期货的高溢价正在消失。【原文：A squeeze in the London Metal Exchange aluminum market is drawing to a close, with a hefty premium for October futures disappearing after a wave of selling over the past two trading days.】

item.title: 康斯伯格股价上涨，荷兰发出 10 亿美元武器订单信号
item.description: 挪威康斯伯格集团（Kongsberg Gruppen ASA）即将签署一项价值110亿克朗（10亿美元）的协议，为荷兰提供防空武器系统，从而推动了该公司股价的上涨。【原文：Norway’s Kongsberg Gruppen ASA is close to signing a 11 billion-krone ($1 billion) agreement to supply the Netherlands with air defense weapons systems, pushing up the stock.】

item.title: 波兰在预算支出增加的情况下重返欧洲债券市场
item.description: 波兰已要求银行安排欧元债券的发行，这是继 2024 年两次不同寻常的大规模销售之后，波兰有可能再次利用国际债务市场。【原文：Poland has asked banks to arrange the issuance of euro-denominated bonds, potentially tapping the international debt market once more after two unusually large sales in 2024.】

item.title: Adobe 推出人工智能视频生成器，与 OpenAI 和 Meta 展开竞争
item.description: Adobe 公司发布了可创建和修改视频的人工智能工具，与大型科技公司和初创企业一道，试图利用对新兴技术的需求。【原文：Adobe Inc. unveiled artificial intelligence tools that can create and modify videos, joining Big Tech companies and startups in trying to capitalize on demand for the emerging technology.】

item.title: 刚果取消石油和天然气许可申请，计划重新启动竞标
item.description: 刚果民主共和国石油部长艾梅-萨孔比-莫伦多（Aime Sakombi Molendo）表示，该国取消了两年多前发布的 27 个石油区块的招标。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo canceled a call for bids for 27 oil blocks that it issued more than two years ago, according to Oil Minister Aime Sakombi Molendo.】

item.title: BC Partners 称私募股权投资不应贪婪于 IPO
item.description: 资产管理公司 BC Partners 认为，私募股权公司应在估值方面做出让步，并为新上市项目留出资金，以便在目前的 "买方市场 "中取得成功。【原文：Private equity firms should compromise on valuation and leave money on the table for new listings to succeed in what is currently a “buyer’s market,” according to asset manager BC Partners.】

item.title: 南非不断增加的燃料进口引发供应短缺风险
item.description: 国有物流公司 Transnet SOC Ltd.表示，南非迅速转变为燃料净进口国，这带来了供应风险，需要基础设施来储存和运输燃料。【原文：South Africa’s rapid switch to become a net importer of fuel creates supply risks requiring infrastructure to store and transport the fuel, according to state-owned logistics firm Transnet SOC Ltd.】

item.title: 东京地铁首次公开募股将筹资 23 亿美元，创日本六年来最大上市纪录
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，东京地铁公司的首次公开募股已募集到 3,486 亿日元（23 亿美元）资金，此前该公司的股票定价达到了市场范围的最高点，这表明日本六年来最大的上市需求十分旺盛。【原文：Tokyo Metro Co.’s initial public offering has raised ¥348.6 billion ($2.3 billion) after the company priced shares at the top of the marketed range, people familiar with the matter said, in a show of hot demand for Japan’s biggest listing in six years.】

item.title: 印度通胀率创九个月新高令印度央行保持警惕
item.description: 印度 9 月份通胀加速的速度超过了预期，这证明在降息呼声日益高涨之际，印度央行有理由保持谨慎。【原文：India’s inflation accelerated at a faster pace than expected in September, justifying the central bank’s caution as calls grow to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 新兴货币走软，交易员在评估中国经济刺激计划
item.description: 由于中国的新刺激措施未能引发对高风险资产的广泛积极情绪，发展中经济体的货币大多对美元走软。【原文：Currencies in developing economies mostly weakened to the dollar as China’s new stimulus measures failed to spark a broader positive sentiment toward riskier assets.】

item.title: 埃利奥特要求西南航空公司召开特别会议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）已通知美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines Co.【原文：Elliott Investment Management has informed Southwest Airlines Co. that it’s requesting a special shareholder meeting, according to people with knowledge of the matter, officially kicking off the activist investor’s first US proxy fight since 2017.】

item.title: 供应充足，欧洲债券风险降至十年最低
item.description: 衡量欧洲债券市场风险的一个关键指标已降至十年来的最低点，因为多年来困扰该地区货币市场的优质证券稀缺问题继续消散。【原文：A key measure of bond market risk in Europe has fallen to the lowest in a decade as the scarcity of high-quality securities that plagued the region’s money markets for years continues to dissipate.】
